返回值:Stringjquery

A string containing the jQuery version number.

  • 1.0 新增jquery

.jquery property is assigned to the jQuery prototype, commonly referred to by its alias $.fn. It is a string containing the version number of jQuery, such as "1.5.0" or "1.4.4".

示例:

Determine if an object is a jQuery object

jQuery 代码:

var a = { what: "A regular JS object" },
    b = $('body');
     
if ( a.jquery ) { // falsy, since it's undefined
    alert(' a is a jQuery object! ');    
}

if ( b.jquery ) { // truthy, since it's a string
    alert(' b is a jQuery object! ');
}

示例:

Get the current version of jQuery running on the page

jQuery 代码:

alert( 'You are running jQuery version: ' + $.fn.jquery );
